name: Aut Labs Plugin
description: this is a description of quest onboarding plugin

module.title: Onboarding
module.shortDescription: Onboarding Quests allow you to strategically onboard community roles by presenting a set of Tasks which must be approved.
module.longDescription: Onboarding Quests enable you to assemble a series of tasks that members must successfully complete to claim a given role within your community. Through these quests, you can assess their knowledge and ensure their suitability for the given role.
